short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically closes tabs with matching titles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you want to close Tabs automatically which contain a specific keyword in the title?
Annoyed of getting redirected to the same pages which you need to close as fast as possible?

Then don't search anymore.
This plugin will do this job for you.

Simply add all the Keywords you to the extensions options menu and it will close any tab where the title gets updated and includes a keyword.
